name: MSR Mini-Ground Hog Tent Stake Kit (6 Pack)
categories: Mini-Ground Hog Tent Stake Kit (6 Pack)
description: These light, compact stakes penetrate easily and hold tenaciously in medium to firm soil. Attached pull cords make them easy to remove.Made of light, strong 7000-series aluminum.Notches on head prevent guylines from sliding off.Includes 6 stakes.Length is 15cm.
